Murton Colliery Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
murton-colliery-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Martha [unknown arranger]
Fatten Pasture Ground, Murton, County Durham For bands that had not won a prize over £10 since 1933 Prizes - 1st £7 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £3, 4th £2. March contest - 1st(£1) Blackhall, 2nd(10s.) Brancepeth, 3rd Hetton. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£1) Ashington, 2nd(10s.) Craghead, 3rd Blackhall.
Nov. 8, 2013, 10:28 a.m. Jan. 5, 2019, 6:26 p.m.
1 Blackhall Colliery Wilfred Dawson
2 Reg Vardy Band Jack Smith
3 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. B. Wright
4 Ashington Public W. S. Bond
Unknown Result Hetton Silver Band J. W. Richardson
